intro: Bolbodium ustulatum, commonly known as the fire blight plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is native to South Africa and is characterized by its compact, succulent growth habit. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in spring, followed by small, round fruits. Bolbodium ustulatum is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its unique appearance and drought tolerance. It thrives in well-drained soils and requires minimal water once established.
